mapper.select: SELECT service_id, service.group_id as group_id, group_name, service_name, wechat_app_name, alarm_way, service.description as description, service.update_time as update_time FROM service, service_group WHERE service.group_id = service_group.group_id AND service.service_id = #{serviceId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO service ( service_id, group_id, service_name, wechat_app_name, alarm_way, description, update_time ) VALUES ( #{serviceId}, #{groupId}, #{serviceName}, #{wechatAppName}, #{alarmWay}, #{description}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE service SET service_name = #{serviceName}, group_id = #{groupId}, wechat_app_name = #{wechatAppName}, alarm_way = #{alarmWay}, description = #{description}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE service_id = #{serviceId}
